segments.text: We have mild wines and strong liquors . Which kind do you prefer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've no idea . I'd like to listen to your suggestion .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's my pleasure . Actually , it's really hard to say as individual tastes are different . As for myself , I'd like to recommend gin and tonic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'll try gin and tonic .
segments.speaker: S2
